name: Sieg Fichte
text: Pizza was great, they stay open late even for carry out. Very competitively priced to fit good pizza.

name: Lola Knudsen
text: So everything was cold. Especially the cheese sticks. In the middle still cold had to nuke. The garlic knots were less than Luke warm. The wings were Luke warm. Didn't see a way to leave a review after order. For the first time ever I think â€¦More

name: Alex Dunn
text: Very nice staff who are pleasant and customer focused. The restaurant is in a desperate need of cleaning from top to bottom and they were out of many items on the menu. Bottled water? Nope. Iced tea? Nope. Diet soda? Nope. The seating is dated and the dining area seemed like an afterthought.

name: Janette Karas
text: I call these guys all the time, fast & especially good, very tasty this time... I ordered the boneless chicken & alfredo pasta w/bread sticks.... highly recommend- loved it!! :-) :-)

name: Julia Campbell
text:
This has to be one of the best places in town to get Pizza.
The staff are the best and always so helpful. My son always calls in our order for pick up and they make sure it is super hot and fresh when we pick the food â€¦More

name: Minh Hughes
text: Typical Pizza Hut. Food is consistent with past visitations (be it in Bellingham or Stanwood). Staff was friendly. Cashier knew the current deals off top of her head, which is nice. Ordered carry out on a football night. Order was ready in a quick fashion. With the turn in weather, their store was a touch cold from the AC being on.

name: Christine Barnes
text: The Pizza Hut we used to order from was so mediocre, but this has got to be the best Pizza Hut in town, in terms of quality. Every pizza we've ordered has been so incredibly fresh and delicious! And the breadsticks are always super soft and â€¦More

name: Kourtney Oberst
text: Today I got a dinner box for lunch/ dinner and my fiance wanted spicy wings. So I got him the wings. Your red sauce gives me really bad heart burn so I made my own white sauce pizza. Not only does the marinara give me heart burn, the spice â€¦More

name: Ariel McMillan
text: Hey cool. Thanks for haning up on me mid question. I could hear your boss in the background. Not my first choice but it was a $100 order. So. Guess I'm going elsewhere everytime now. Novice or first job you should've been trained better. Glad I'm not a #pizzaslut anymore.

name: Gail Dieringer
text: We ordered pizza to be delivered to us in the park for a party we were having.  It arrived hot and on time, and the driver was really friendly and helpful.  We will definitely order from them again!

name: Joshua Scott
text: Employees were rude and uninterested in helping me. Too busy watching the basketball game. And apparently also too busy to make my pizza well. I ordered a white sauce pizza, and I guess that means they don't have to put hardly any cheese AT ALL on it. I'm not kidding, there were whole sliced with no cheese. Rude. Bad. Ugh. No.

name: Ellen Buckles
text: This is my neighborhood pizzahut. I love these people. They push an amazing amount of orders and still manage to be on time and friendly. They are always so kind, and if there is any issue with your order, they genuinely care and try to â€¦More

name: Dubois Tara
text: This place was busy when I arrived and the manager really went out of her way to make sure I was taken care of and happy at the end of my visit. Thx again!

name: Michael Voss
text: Slow and expensive compared to any other place for mediocre tasting pizza. Every time I go there the person I'm talking to has no idea what they are doing and always requires help from someone else to ring up my order our take my money. Go somewhere else they aren't much further away.

name: Ben Newcomb
text: Great deals, great food, on time and handled professionally

name: Gevan Rogers
text: $16.00 for a med thin crust 2 topping pizza. Sorry that's just out of line. When I say something the manager comes back with smart a%% remark. Last time for me and I'll tell all my friends.

name: Chantel Smith
text: Delicious pizza with really nice staff who have good customer service

name: Taylor Olson
text: We've had nothing but problems with this location. Our orders are made incorrectly far more than they are correctly. They always seem to be "out" of everything.

name: Josh Herder
text: Very poor customer service. We were treated as an inconvenience when we asked if we could dine in store. Waited in vain for a good ten minutes at our table for someone to wait on us. Then I found out they don't carry pizones anymore!

name: Valerie Zorn
text: I had a great experience at this Pizza Hut. The lady that helped us was so nice and gave us such excellent service even though all we ordered was my son's BookIt Pizza. I don't get service like that very often. Thank you!

name: Dan Moore
text: I was surprised how good the pasta is, more than just pizza

name: Robert Young
text: Love it when they have their ten dollar any deal

name: Tammy Young
text: I love this place you order they get it done they always make sure that you have Peppers cheese napkin you never leave there without the things that you need all those smiley faces greet you when you come through the door they're the best thank you pizzahut Northwest Boulevard

name: B Rad
text:
Well, I will be buying Pizza at Wal-Mart from now on. Since when is a LARGE 2 topping pizza approx 16inches in diameter and $23 phugin dollars?
We paid for extra cheese and I could still see the dough through the toppings. â€¦More

name: Erick Batton
text: Good service, good food, nothing wrong with my order. Indoor seating.

name: Nicole Carpenter
text: We ordered pizza and half of it was bare no cheese no sauce no toppings all of it had slid to the other side

name: John Lile
text: I love Pizza hut, what else is there to say?

name: Charlene Laufer
text: Gotta love the pan...

name: Callie Thompson
text: I love the pizza there!ðŸ˜€ðŸ˜„

text: The employee's are awesome i was handicap and they helped me out with my pizza with  out me asking thank you all so much we will be back to this location because they treat their customers with respect

name: Antaun Williams
text: Great pizza!!! Friendly staff

name: Diana Collings
text: Always a perfect slice.

name: Sierra Roath
text: A bit over priced but yummy food

name: M Norman
text: Manager was rude, employees were nice. Food was good.

text: Iâ€™ve ordered 3 times from this location and all 3 theyâ€™ve  messed up my order.  Not a fan of this store.

name: Alice Freist
text: Totally adequate pizza and sides. Promot deliveries and they're even friendly in the store, too!

name: Garysh Aneraugust
text: Typical pizza hut but it's location is slightly inconvenient from most parts of town.
